about_the_game:
Harness the power of magical cards and become a master strategist in Hexoria, a turn-based roguelike deckbuilder game. Explore a dangerous world, build and expand your village, gather resources, and use your cards to gain obedience. Survive the unknown and lead your cult to glory!



Welcome to the magical world of Hexoria. As a student at a magic school, you must harness the power of magical cards and customize your deck to gain obedience from your followers. The final exam is the ultimate test of your skills, pitting you against your master in a game of strategy and wit. But beware, the world of Hexoria is dangerous and unpredictable, and you must build and expand your village, gather resources, and curse your followers to survive.

WISHLIST!

Add it to your wishlist today and follow us for updates on the game's development.

FEATURES🔥


  • 🃏 Customize your deck
  • 🏡 Build your village
  • ⚒️ Gather resources and survive the cult
  • 🧙‍♀️ Curse your followers
  • 🔮 Gain obedience

Hexoria's turn-based mechanics require careful planning and strategic thinking. You'll need to manage your resources, plan your moves, and react to the mage's actions. You must also balance your priorities between exploration, resource gathering, and cult management. As you progress through the game, you'll face tougher challenges and earn new cards to add to your deck.

Hexoria features inspiration from city-builder card games like Stacklands, survival games like Frostpunk and cultist elements from Cult of the Lamb. Will you choose to focus on building your village, or will you seek to gain more power through dark magic and manipulation? It's up to you to decide in this thrilling adventure!
